## Developer Guide

{**r4googleads**} was designed with forking, tweaking and community contribution in mind.  The package covers basically three functionalities: **authentication**, **sending queries to Google** and **loading and processing data**.  This guide intends to facilitate tailored use of the package and pull request based contributions. 

Hence we explain the basic architecture of the {**r4googleads**} package in this document.
